meta.description:
Let's consider a complex transportation network comprised of 6 major cargo hubs, stretching from a main dispatch center to a primary delivery destination. These hubs are interconnected by roads, each with its own weight limit for cargo transportation.

Here's how the weight limits of each road are distributed, reflecting the maximum amount of cargo (in tons) that can be transported from one hub to another:

- From Hub 0 (Dispatch Center): Can send cargo to Hub 1 (7 tons), Hub 2 (8 tons), Hub 3 (1 ton), Hub 4 (2 tons), and Hub 5 (4 tons).
- From Hub 1: Can send cargo to Hub 0 (15 tons), Hub 2 (16 tons), Hub 4 (9 tons), and Hub 5 (13 tons).
- From Hub 2: Can send cargo to Hub 0 (9 tons), Hub 1 (1 ton), Hub 3 (9 tons), Hub 4 (13 tons), and Hub 5 (13 tons).
- From Hub 3: Can send cargo to Hub 0 (10 tons), Hub 1 (11 tons), Hub 2 (19 tons), Hub 4 (1 ton), and Hub 5 (12 tons).
- From Hub 4: Can send cargo to Hub 0 (15 tons), Hub 1 (16 tons), Hub 2 (7 tons), Hub 3 (11 tons), and Hub 5 (19 tons).
- From Hub 5 (Destination): Can send cargo back to Hub 0 (10 tons), Hub 1 (12 tons), Hub 2 (12 tons), Hub 3 (12 tons), and Hub 4 (20 tons).

In this model, a capacity of "0" indicates there is no direct road connection between those two hubs.

The challenge is to determine the maximum amount of cargo that can be transported from Hub 0 (the dispatch center) to Hub 5 (the destination) per day, in a manner that the cargo on each road does not surpass its listed weight limit. What is the maximum amount of cargo that can be delivered from the dispatch center to the destination in tons per day? Please note that the answer should provide only the optimal value under the maximum flow scenario, and all the data in the problem details should be included in the created question.

sets.name: H
sets.description: Set of hubs in the transportation network

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of roads between hubs in tons

objective.name: max_flow
objective.expr: quicksum(flow['0'][j] for j in H if j != '0') - quicksum(flow[j]['0'] for j in H if j != '0')
objective.description: Maximize the flow from Hub 0 to Hub 5

constraints.name: capacity_0_1
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 0 to Hub 1

constraints.name: capacity_0_2
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 0 to Hub 2

constraints.name: capacity_0_3
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 0 to Hub 3

constraints.name: capacity_0_4
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 0 to Hub 4

constraints.name: capacity_0_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 0 to Hub 5

constraints.name: capacity_1_0
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 1 to Hub 0

constraints.name: capacity_1_2
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 1 to Hub 2

constraints.name: capacity_1_4
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 1 to Hub 4

constraints.name: capacity_1_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 1 to Hub 5

constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 2 to Hub 0

constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 2 to Hub 1

constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 2 to Hub 3

constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 2 to Hub 4

constraints.name: capacity_2_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 2 to Hub 5

constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 3 to Hub 0

constraints.name: capacity_3_1
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 3 to Hub 1

constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 3 to Hub 2

constraints.name: capacity_3_4
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 3 to Hub 4

constraints.name: capacity_3_5
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 3 to Hub 5

constraints.name: capacity_4_0
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 4 to Hub 0

constraints.name: capacity_4_1
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 4 to Hub 1

constraints.name: capacity_4_2
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 4 to Hub 2

constraints.name: capacity_4_3
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 4 to Hub 3

constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 5 to Hub 2

constraints.name: capacity_5_3

constraints.name: capacity_5_4
constraints.description: Capacity constraint from Hub 5 to Hub 4

constraints.name: flow_conservation_1
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(flow['1'][j] for j in H if j != '1')
constraints.expr_rhs: quicksum(flow[j]['1'] for j in H if j != '1')
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Hub 1

constraints.name: flow_conservation_2
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(flow['2'][j] for j in H if j != '2')
constraints.expr_rhs: quicksum(flow[j]['2'] for j in H if j != '2')
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Hub 2

constraints.name: flow_conservation_3
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(flow['3'][j] for j in H if j != '3')
constraints.expr_rhs: quicksum(flow[j]['3'] for j in H if j != '3')
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Hub 3

constraints.name: flow_conservation_4
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(flow['4'][j] for j in H if j != '4')
constraints.expr_rhs: quicksum(flow[j]['4'] for j in H if j != '4')
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Hub 4
